divs: sighting details1. we were driving through irvine center drive and all of a sudden a gold flash of light came through the sky. 2. the light first flashed through the sunroof of our 2002 jetta. 3.at first we thought it was a shooting star and then it was too close to our atmosphere for it to be true, and it was too fast and it dissapeared like a light switch went off. 4. the object was a golden disc\boomerang shape and it was fast and zizagged through the sky. 5. we were having quite the chat [ i dont remeber what about ] and then a relative suddenly flinched and asked "what was that?" and i looked just in time to see what was happening. and it was a sci-fi feeling like in the middle of a star wars movie. and eery in a way, and a feeling i had never experienced before. and we were quiet for a few minutes afterwards. 6. the sight of the object dissapeared not faded, but just blinked off like boom. and was nowhere in sight like it had been caught and hided.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Irvine
There were no other sightings in Irvine on or around March 1st 2007
Summary: gold flash of light through the air
